org.zkoss.ztl
Class JQuery

java.lang.Object
  org.zkoss.ztl.ClientWidget
      org.zkoss.ztl.JQuery

public class JQuery
extends ClientWidget

A simulator of JQuery client side object, which wraps the JQuery client side API.

Author:
jumperchen
